title: The reason why I find Riot's interaction with Reddit really frustrating
body:
Is because it feels like they spend more time interacting with the league reddit community than they do with their own. I don't know if that will change with the full move to boards, but I hope it does. Lcs focuses on everything reddit so the majority of the references they make to the community are reddit based, that too is frustrating.

I don't actually hate Reddit because by in large I find it very uninteresting as talking to people theres feels like interacting with drones. I enjoy leauge communities here because people have personality, even if its a personality I don't care for.

I really hope with the move to boards, Riot prioritizes interaction with their actual community here over reddit, as it should be.
